data.eml:eml: Review of the genera Agelosus Sharp, 1889, Apostenolinus Bernhauer, 1934 and Apecholinus Bernhauer, 1933 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini: Staphylinina)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smetana, Aleš (2018): Review of the genera Agelosus Sharp, 1889, Apostenolinus Bernhauer, 1934 and Apecholinus Bernhauer, 1933 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini: Staphylinina). Zootaxa 4471 (2): 201-244, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4471.2.1
